title.description: The title of the navigation bar

loading.description: Whether or not to display the loading prompt in the navigation bar
loading.description_zh: 是否在导航条显示 loading 加载提示

frontColor.description: The navbar foreground color values, including the colors of buttons, titles, and status bars, are only supported for #ffffff and #000000
frontColor.description_zh: 导航条前景颜色值，包括按钮、标题、状态栏的颜色，仅支持 #ffffff 和 #000000

backgroundColor.description: The value of the background color of the navigation bar, the valid value is the hexadecimal color
backgroundColor.description_zh: 导航条背景颜色值，有效值为十六进制颜色

colorAnimationDuration.description: The duration of the animation when changing the color of the navigation bar, which is 0 by default (i.e. no animation)
colorAnimationDuration.description_zh: 改变导航栏颜色时的动画时长，默认为 0 （即没有动画效果）

colorAnimationTimingFunc.description: When changing the color of the navigation bar, the animation method supports linear, easeIn, easeOut, and easeInOut
colorAnimationTimingFunc.description_zh: 改变导航栏颜色时的动画方式，支持 linear 、 easeIn 、 easeOut 和 easeInOut
